thread.title: Abdel Russell Is Now Primarily Focusing on Philanthropy and Writing Books
thread.title_full: Abdel Russell Is Now Primarily Focusing on Philanthropy and Writing Books

author: Yesenia M
title: Abdel Russell Is Now Primarily Focusing on Philanthropy and Writing Books
text:
Abdel Russell's Millionaire Work Ethic Now Includes Long Nights on Microsoft Word, and iTunes' iBooks Author He became an author in 2015, and saw all of his books climb iTunes' iBooks charts. Prior to that, the African American entrepreneur and mentor ran a succesful indie record label, for almost a decade. He now resides in Rockland County, NY, donating his time and money to local charities and schools.
By the way he dresses you could not tell that Mr. Russell is one of the wealthiest Black business men in the lower Hudson Valley. He found his most recent success in music, when he discovered/managed a popular female Hip Hop artist named La ' Vega. To add to that he also owns several catalogs of Hip Hop, EDM, and Pop music.
His company, MVB ENTERTAINMENT LLC., also invests in independent film projects within the tri-state area, and his company owns an online radio station and multiple fashion and entertainment websites. Abdel has recently said that writing books and philanthropy is now what he is primarily focusing on, but if he spots new talent in the music scene, don't be surprised to see him and his company marketing and promoting a new act.
